official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to include a description of the medical assistance for medicare cost-sharing available under title XIX of such Act in the annual notice of benefits provided to medicare beneficiaries.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to include a description of the medical assistance for Medicare cost-sharing available under title XIX (Medicaid) of such Act in the annual notice of benefits provided to Medicare beneficiaries.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to include a description of the medical assistance for medicare cost-sharing available under title XIX of such Act in the annual notice of benefits provided to medicare beneficiaries.
